repositories.name: React-Redux RealWorld Example: TodoMVC for the Real World
repositories.description: An example full-stack "real world" application built with Redux. The RealWorld project also includes many other implementations of the front and back ends of the site, specifically intended to show how different server and client implementations of the same project and API spec compare with each other.
